Class OthelloPlayer

java.lang.Object
  OthelloPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumanOthelloPlayer, StupidComputerOthelloPlayer
public abstract class OthelloPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

This is the top-level class for all player classes.

flipColorOfPieces

private void flipColorOfPieces(info.gridworld.grid.Location start,
                               info.gridworld.grid.Location end)
Changes (flips) the color of the pieces to the current player's color in the locations from start (included) to end (not included)

Parameters:
start - first location to color (flip)
end - first location past last location to color (flip)
